name: Journey of a Student
description:
You play as a Student of Grand Province University, a prestigious college that gives students diplomas in matters of seconds!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made by Dominic P.  in 2022 and is a project for my Digital Writing class.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have little to no experience in game design and this only took me a week to make. I'm not sure if I will ever update this game.
